title: Questions on 820-3115-B not powering on
message:
I have this 820-3115-B this machine did have water damage around the isl6259. i get no green light on the charger( even though i have 3.42v on the onewire) but no smc_bc_acok coming from the isl6259 which is where its created i believe... so i did some more checking around noticed that i get nothing on the charger Agate. i get 6.87v on one side of r7086 (the resistance on r7086 is .332 kh) and nothing on the other side.

any idea on that?

title: Questions on 820-3115-B not powering on
message:
I guess ISL is bad but check this....

Voltaje on pin 2 from ISL?? [COLOR=#B22222]Should be about 16V[/COLOR]
Voltage on pin 3 from ISL?? [COLOR=#B22222]Should be about 4V[/COLOR]
Resistance between pins 27/28 from ISL?? [COLOR=#B22222]Should be about 20 ohm[/COLOR]
Resistance between pins 17/18 from ISL?? [COLOR=#B22222]Should be about 2.6 ohm[/COLOR]
Voltage on F7040?? [COLOR=#B22222]Should be 12.6V[/COLOR]

title: Questions on 820-3115-B not powering on
message:
i don't think its the ISL, I've changed it twice. 
pin2 is 16.31v
pin3 is 3.98v
resistance between pins 27/28 20.3ohm
resistance between mins 17/18 2.63ohms
voltage on F7040 12.24v

title: Questions on 820-3115-B not powering on
message: Resistance to GND on SMC_BC_ACOK? The 12.23V on PPBUS suggests the SMC is not running

title: Questions on 820-3115-B not powering on
message: .494 is not a resistance measurement, probably diode mode. Measure again.

title: Questions on 820-3115-B not powering on
message: sorry i did have in diod mode before 0.396khms is what i get

title: Questions on 820-3115-B not powering on
message: 396 Ohms is way to low. Could be the ISL6259 or SMC usually. Start with pulling the 6259 and measuring again. Check for corrosion around SMC.
